alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Broward County through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weston, or near Davie, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Sunrise, Weston, Cooper City, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road and Sunshine Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
